message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing $14,000. I'm confident it will be a great investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? It's a fantastic deal on a product of this quality.
I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. I think this is a good compromise considering its value to me.
